VoiceLine.Subtitle: Training simulation initiated\n\nFollow the on-screen instructions to complete your forklift training.
Step 1: Enter the Forklift\n\nPress the button below to climb into the forklift.
Step 2: Start the Forklift\n\nPress the ignition button to start the engine.
Step 3: Drive Control Test\n\nPush the drive lever forward to move ahead.
Step 3: Drive Control Test\n\nPull the drive lever backward to reverse.
Step 4: Steering Test\n\nTurn the steering wheel fully to the right.
Step 4: Steering Test\n\nNow turn the steering wheel fully to the left.
Step 5: Forklift Test\n\nPush the fork control lever up to lift the forks.
Step 5: Forklift Test\n\nPull the fork control lever down to lower the forks.
Step 6: Position for the Crate\n\nDrive forward until the forks are lined up under the crate.
Step 6: Position for the Crate\n\nUse the lift control to raise the crate for transport.
Step 7: Transport the Crate\n\nDrive to the highlighted drop-off zone.
Step 7: Transport the Crate\n\nLower the forks to set the crate down.
Step 8: Back Away\n\nReverse the forklift away from the stacked crate.
Step 9: Final Fork Position\n\nFully lower the forks to their resting position.
Congratulations!\nYou have completed the forklift operation training.\nYouâ€™re now ready to put your skills into practice.
